text: WWE 2K22 is a professional wrestling video game based on WWE 2K. It was released on May 28, 2021. Rey Mysterio is the cover athlete for the game. Category:2022 video games Category:2K Sports games Category:Crossover video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Professional wrestling video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:WWE video games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: WWE 2K22
